other_tests.findings: Sequencing of the nine GHR coding exons revealed a homozygous 22-bp deletion in exon 10, resulting in a frameshift introducing novel codons from position 424-449 and a premature termination codon at 450.
GHR1–449 showed Jak2 activation. Phosphorylation of Jak2, Stat3, and Erk2 was confirmed, but no Stat5 activation was detected.
GHR1–449 and GHRwt showed similar intracellular and cell surface distribution, localized in the endoplasmic reticulum and Golgi complex.
Mean fluorescence levels for expressed GHR1–449 and GHRwt were similar, demonstrating comparable cell surface expression.
